item.title: Street is never cleaned, 2nd August
item.description:
I have lived here for three months now and no one has ever came to clean the street. This is full of leafs and cigarettes and litter and these are blocking water / construing an hazard. The street should be cleaned regularly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Henshaw Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 2nd August
item.description:
Once again I am reporting the number of potholes that are up our lane which is dangerous to people walking and cars driving up the lane I've already fallen over and hurt my ankle Still no one as come out not even to put your silly white lines round them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Berryman's Lane, Perry Vale, London

item.title: Flying tipping, 2nd August
item.description:
This is months since I first reported this problem and until date nothing as been done apart from more items being dumped there, you replied to me saying it would be sorted but still nothing this a on going problem!!! But because we are a little lane off the main road we totally get forgot about this rubbish is right next to our properties!!!! If you could please get this sorted would be much appreciated
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Berryman's Lane, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large yellow bag filled with rubble, 2nd August
item.description:
The bag has been left in the middle of the pathway for 1 week. This could be really problematic for people in wheelchairs and with prams causing them to use the road instead of the path - as the road is very tight with traffic this is potentially a dangerous issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingswood Drive, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Emergency gate broken, 2nd August
item.description:
Emergency gate at intersection of Grosvenor Terrace and Bethwin St has been crashed into and one of the posts is broken. This is a hazard and may allow unauthorised traffic into the estate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grosvenor Terrace, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wheelie Bins illegally left in Road., 2nd August
item.description:
Residents of 82,Bastion Road,SE20RG regularly leave their wheelie bins in the road outside their house to secure their parking space. This is both dangerous and illegal. REPORTED SEVERAL TIMES.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glendown Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree at front of house (health and safety risk), 2nd August
item.description:
Tree touching upstairs bedroom window. Elderly housebound mother can't have windows open; Flies, insects, etc. - even SQUIRRELS get in - Major health hazard (she has serious immune system disorders). Branches have smashed windows when windy

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
